- The combination of semi-finalists "Helena Suková Mary Pierce" matches with an event on 8 May, not 9 May.
- The runner-up "Conchita Martínez Patricia Tarabini" matches events on both 1 May and 8 May.
- The winner "Gigi Fernández Natalia Zvereva 3 - 6, 7 - 6, 6 - 4" occurs on 8 May (Tier I) and the Grand Slam starting 29 May.
